name: zip-phonegap-demo
description: A phonegap app that demonstrates the use of Javascript zip libraries

scripts.installzipjs: git clone https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/zip.js && mv zip.js/WebContent/ www/js/3rd/zip.js && rm -rf zip.js
scripts.installdeps: npm run removedeps && mkdir www/js/3rd/ && npm run installbenchmarkjs && npm run installzipjs && npm rum installczfs
scripts.windowsinstallzipjs: git clone https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/zip.js && move zip.js\WebContent www\js\3rd\zip.js && node ./node_modules/rimraf/bin.js zip.js
scripts.windowsinstalldeps: npm run windowsremovedeps && mkdir www\js\3rd && npm run windowsinstallbenchmarkjs && npm run windowsinstallzipjs && npm run windowsinstallczfs
scripts.setupandroid: phonegap platform add android ; phonegap platform update android
scripts.setupudevandroid: sudo cp devops/android.udev.rules /etc/udev/rules.d/51-android.rules && sudo chmod a+r /etc/udev/rules.d/51-android.rules && sudo service udev restart
scripts.bumpandroid: npm run buildandroid && npm run installandroid
scripts.setupwindows: phonegap platform add windows & phonegap platform update windows

author: bguiz
